arrows.description: Many archers prefer the thin diameters for Field and Target. Now the ABSOLUTE.Series also offers a slim shaft in its lineup. The spine values cover a wide range of applications. Available in spine 350, 400, 500, and 600. The matching point is the SL Convex III made of tool steel, extremely durable. Shaft bending is nearly eliminated as a result. Break-Off elements in 10-grain increments make tuning easy—one point for weights from 90 to 140 grain. Components are available separately.

We skip the grand advertising promises and deliver top quality at a very attractive price. The spine values cover a wide range of applications. Available in spine 350, 400, 500, 600, 700, and 800. The matching point is the ML Apex in 70, 100, or 130 grain. Fine-tuning can be adjusted with brass screw-in weights in 10, 20, 30, or 40 grain. Components are available separately.

Best quality at a fair price. Available in 350 spine and straightness classes of 0.001 and 0.003. The tip for 3D is the LL Apex in 90 or 120 grain. For indoor, a 180 grain tip can also be ordered. With brass screw-in weights in 10, 20, or 40 grain, the required fine-tuning can be adjusted. Components are available separately.

Following the success of the ABSOLUTE.22, now also available in a very large diameter. Available in 350 spine and straightness classes of 0.001. A lightweight shaft with a large diameter for fast arrows. The tip for 3D is the LL Apex in 100 or 130 grain. For indoor (only conditionally suitable), a 180-grain tip can also be ordered. However, we do not recommend use on straw targets! With brass screw-in weights in 10, 20, 30, or 40 grain, the required fine-tuning can be adjusted. Components are available separately.

A heavy Carbon Express shaft with cross-wrapped Carbon Express layers for extreme stability. Top quality at a very fair price. The spine values are primarily designed for hunting use. Available in spine 300, 350, and 400. Compatible with all standard points and inserts from TopHat for inner diameter .244, as well as nocks such as the Beiter push-in nock 19/2. Components sold separately.

The newly developed Nijora Archery Elsu Pro Carbon Express shaft features a special linear winding consisting of multi-layered Carbon Express fiber fabrics. The design is naturally suited for bows beyond 50 lbs. Through this newly developed construction, utilizing the latest aerospace-grade Carbon Express fibers available on the market, which are pressed together in varying windings, the Elsu Pro stabilizes very quickly when shot from the bow with high acceleration pressure and speed. As a result, it achieves an even flatter trajectory compared to a standard cylindrically wound shaft of the same weight and spine value. The Elsu Pro Carbon Express shaft is a thin full-Carbon Express shaft, crafted using multilayer technology and hand-sanded: linear inner diameter ID 0.204 inch / 5.18mm.

Gold Tip Tip introduces the Airstrike™, featuring an ultra-light profile with an inner diameter of 0.204 and an extreme Front of Center design, a high-modulus Carbon Express construction, and an exclusive Dyna-Tek Slick Shield® coating. Built for speed and precision over long distances, the Airstrike™ closes long gaps faster and penetrates deeper with pinpoint accuracy. It is the fastest and most versatile long-range hunting arrow your target will never see.

The new Black Eagle Label from Gold Tip Tip exceeds straightness standards and surpasses your expectations. Each Black Eagle Label is laser-sorted at multiple points along the shaft to ensure straightness over the entire length, not just at the ends. This means precision that will impress even your most demanding bowhunters. With its Renegade-style design, matching the legendary toughness of Gold Tip Tip, you get an arrow with looks and performance that kills. AVAILABLE ONLY AT AUTHORIZED PROFESSIONAL ARCHERY RETAILERS Specs: +/- .0025" straightness tolerance +/- 0.5 grain weight tolerance Multiple laser shaft straightness sorting Includes 20 Grain FACT weight for increased FOC Smart Carbon Express Technology—pure Carbon Express, no fillers Legendary durability and straightness retention

The Quantum from Gold Tip Tip, the newest member of the Black Eagle Label family, is designed for deep penetration, and with its micro-diameter .204 design, it reduces side drift compared to arrows with a larger diameter. Add the dark design of the Renegade, and you get a subtle look that matches the legendary performance of Gold Tip Tip. Through the convergence of laser straightness, unmatched toughness, and micro-diameter penetration, the Black Eagle Label Quantum delivers performance that is lethally effective across the board.

The BigArchery Plurima shaft is made of Carbon Express with a very high modulus of elasticity (40 tons), it is precise (straightness +/- 0.001") and available in spines from 350 to 800 (10 different sizes) with a 3.2 mm inner diameter. Arrow made of Carbon Express composite material with a 6.2 mm inner diameter. Pre-cut to 28" length, it has a straightness of +/- 0.006". Complete with nocks, shield vanes, inserts, and screw-in points already installed. Recommended screw-in point: 5/16".

The new CT-Panther is a truly tapered shaft that is tapered over the entire length of the arrow, giving it precise tuning with adjustable spine control. If you cut the shaft at the nock end, you increase the spine of the arrow. If you cut the shaft at the insert end, you decrease the spine of the arrow. With the heavier front end near the insert, you get a better Front-of-Center (FOC), which gives you more stored energy. It comes with standard CT nocks and premium CT inserts. No matter where you cut the shaft, the nocks and inserts fit correctly. When using our proprietary precision multi-directional Carbon Express layering design, you get a full dozen arrows that group easily. With our seamless wrapping, you get 4-5 wraps of Carbon Express material per arrow.

The completely redesigned shaft is much lighter than the CT Whitetail and is designed for the budget-conscious archer. The standard-sized shaft accepts the same inserts and nocks as the CT Whitetail. We are proud to offer arrow shafts with Carbon Express Tech's nocks and inserts.

HIGHER SPEED FOR THE BOW HUNTER Fast Shaft XLT offers the demanding bow hunter additional speed and a flatter trajectory. It is 25 grains lighter than the well-known Fat Shaft from which it was developed: The bow hunter will benefit from this extra speed with a flatter trajectory and increased F.O.C. balance for greater accuracy. FOR FIELD AND 3D The weight savings across all spines make it the shaft of choice for archers shooting 3D and Field in Europe and around the world.

SEAMLESS XLT TECHNOLOGY For Hunter+, we used the proven XLT technology to develop a strong yet fast shaft suitable for all hunting situations. There is no seam in the material, ensuring flawless and consistent performance from Hunter+ XLT shafts. Grouping is guaranteed. BEST CAMO! This new camo technology not only provides an excellent "fit and finish" but also delivers outstanding durability, reduces friction noise on the rest, and adds no extra weight to the shaft! STRONG Hunter+ XLT outperforms many other shafts due to its incredible spine, precision, weight consistency, and straightness...it will hit hard and centered year after year!

SMALL-DIAMETER HUNTING Carbon Express arrows with small diameters were the standard a few years ago, and hunters everywhere loved them; extremely strong, amazing penetration, resistance to crosswinds, they had only one drawback: the overlapping point outsert. HALF-OUT POINT INSERT The point insert is half inside and half outside the shaft (HOT technology). The outer part sits flush with the shaft and has exactly the same diameter. It is easy to install, simple to tune, and allows for perfect broadhead alignment. FRONT-WEIGHT CONSTRUCTION The HOT shaft delivers excellent accuracy due to its built-in front-weight design, achieved through our exclusive XLT process, which places more Carbon Express fiber at the front of the shaft. XLT TECHNOLOGY Like all Carbon Express Impact shafts, the HOT shaft derives its incredible performance from seamless XLT technology, and unlike wrapped shafts, they are strong and consistently devastating!

MORE WEIGHT FOR POWERFUL IMPACTS Hunting arrows need sufficient kinetic energy to deliver the impact that drives broadheads through tough hide and bone. The Titan XLT gives you the edge you need to take on the big game! Whether you're after elk, bear, or a monster buck, the Titan XLT will provide the full penetration power you need. TOUGHEST AND QUIETEST SHAFT The Titan XLT not only gives hunters increased kinetic energy and extra penetration power but also delivers greater accuracy due to the higher weight in the front shaft section (FWD front-weighted design). All this is packed into the quietest and most durable shaft you can find.

THE WORLD'S FIRST BUILT-IN ARROW STABILIZER Stealth XLT is the world's first arrow shaft featuring a unique built-in arrow stabilizer. This vibration-dampening device is factory-installed at the optimal position inside the arrow shaft to stabilize the arrow in flight faster. FORGIVING The built-in Stealth arrow stabilizer has the unique ability to smooth arrow oscillations during flight and helps optimize Front-Of-Center (F.O.C.) balance, resulting in increased accuracy, penetration, and forgiveness. DEADLY SILENCE! The exclusive Stealth arrow stabilizer dampens shaft vibrations and noise during flight and on the rest while drawing. If you've ever spooked an animal while drawing or scared off a duck with the sound of your arrow, then you can easily understand the value of Stealth arrow technology!

ULTIMATE PERFORMANCE & PRECISION FITA, Field & Ultra Fast are incredibly fast, responsive, and precise! The lighter spines offer an unmatched weight-to-spine ratio for FITA Recurve archers. The heavier spines provide more weight for better stability and resistance to wind drift for Compound archers. ULTIMATE INTERNAL COMPONENTS Flush-fitting break-off points are available in a lighter version (stainless steel) for a flatter trajectory or in a high-F.O.C. version (brass) for increased accuracy and forgiveness. The push-in internal Pin Nocks ensure precise alignment for enhanced accuracy. Pin Nocks come in 2 sizes: large (.098") and small (.088").

The Maxima® Pro Recurve RZ is a groundbreaking arrow for the recurve indoor archer. Like the Nano-Pro™ X-Treme™, the Maxima PRO RZ features a stiffer middle section and weaker ends to ensure proper flex and achieve the ideal fletching clearance around the plunger and arrow rest, delivering greater accuracy for recurve archers. The BuffTuff® construction provides extreme durability and withstands even the toughest targets.

The Medallion™-XR is the sister model of the Medallion™-Pro and features 24T Carbon Express in a slim-diameter shaft for the aspiring target archer at a more affordable price. The wide range of spines in this model makes it well-suited for bows with lower poundage and even fits well with youth archers aiming to become future FITA or Olympic champions.

The Nano .166 is a high-performance, durable target arrow made from 24T Carbon Express, designed for beginners and advanced archers. It features an ultra-flat .166"-ID shaft for reduced wind drift. An excellent choice for 3D, JOAD, field, and FITA target shooting in school sports.

The Nano-Pro™ RZ is simply the best composite long-range field target arrow in the world. The Nano-Pro RZ™ is a parallel shaft with three different spines, featuring a more flexible middle Red Zone® technology with stiffer front and rear sections. This multi-spine construction controls how an arrow flexes in flight (dynamic spine), delivering pinpoint precision. The Nano-Pro RZ™ is made from incredibly lightweight yet durable 46-T Carbon Express. Unlike arrows with an aluminum core, the Nano-Pro RZ™ does not take a permanent bend and maintains its initial spine tolerance consistently over multiple seasons.

The Nano-Pro™ X-Treme™ was specifically developed for today's competitive recurve bows. When the difference in success for FITA, NAA, and NFAA long-distance shooting can come down to mere millimeters, the Nano-Pro X-Treme delivers pinpoint precision thanks to its multi-spine construction. With this design, the Nano-Pro X-Treme recovers faster after the shot while simultaneously delivering the flattest trajectory and unmatched close-range accuracy. It stays true to the NanoPro™ series form and has the smallest diameter of all our target arrows. Combined with the parallel shaft design, side wind drift is virtually eliminated. Unlike arrows with an aluminum core, the Nano series does not take on a fixed (permanent) bend and maintains its initial spine tolerance consistently over multiple seasons.

Building on the legacy of the Nano-XR™, the new Nano SST™ is an ultra-slim diameter shaft specifically designed for recurve bows. The Nano SST™ features Tri-Spine Technology with three specific spine ranges, where the stiffest spine is located in the middle of the shaft and the weakest spine is configured at the rear end to ensure optimal fletching clearance through the shot on a recurve bow. The Nano SST™ has an ultra-slim parallel shaft profile that drastically reduces side wind drift, making it the ideal arrow for FITA, NAA, and NFAA long-distance shooting. The Nano SST™ is engineered for optimal speed, strength, and consistency, constructed from 30-T Carbon Express, ensuring it does not take a set (permanent bend) and delivers faster recovery from the bow with superior precision in post-shot distance shooting.

The Nano-XR™ was the first target arrow made from 4-T Carbon Express to achieve superior accuracy, strength, and consistency from shot to shot. Its ultra-small diameter drastically reduces side wind drift and is the ideal arrow for FITA, NAA, and NFAA long-distance shooting. In side-by-side tests, the Nano-XR consistently outperformed comparable aluminum-core Carbon Express arrows in durability, bow rebound, consistency, and speed.

The industry-leading durability of the front and rear of the arrow ensures your quiver stays filled with TANK 23D™ arrows all season long. Combining this rugged construction with the industry-leading, consistent 360-degree spine means this arrow not only finds the bonus rings but also has the toughness to withstand those rear impacts when the competition targets your nocks! The most precise arrow to ever hit the 3D scene is available in three spine sizes to accommodate archers of all sizes.

The revolution of the Series 27 arrow shaft was a challenge that few were willing to attempt, and even fewer succeeded. This revolution required endless trial-and-error builds, followed by countless shots from shooting machines and finalized with field tests by our Factory Pro Staff archers. Years of dedication to research and design led to the development of the ultimate indoor arrow, the MAX 27. The TANK 27™ originates from the leading manufacturer of competitive Carbon Express arrows, Carbon Express Express, and combines a heavy build with an industry-leading, consistent 360-degree spine. The result is the most precise and forgiving Series 27 arrow on the market.

This arrow complies with the maximum diameter of 9.3 mm per FITA and NAA rules. The X-Buster is heavier in grains per inch than CXL™ Pro Arrows, and the additional weight makes it unnecessary for archers to "tune" their equipment to achieve slower, more forgiving speeds indoors. The X-Buster also delivers the correct spine with the right weight—so no additional weight needs to be inserted into the tip. The X-Buster arrows are 50% stronger than competitors' indoor target arrows and last longer without sacrificing shot performance or precision.

With the introduction of the D-Stroyer hunting arrow, Carbon Express Express has further strengthened its reputation for the world's most precise Dual Spine arrows. With three different options available from the new D-Stroyer line by Carbon Express Express, the performance of the exclusive Dual Spine Weight Forward technology is maximized to achieve double the accuracy and unprecedented performance compared to traditional single-spine arrow construction. The patented 2-Spine arrow shaft reduces vibrations by 50% compared to Single Spine and delivers double the accuracy.

Mastering the bending of an arrow in flight (Dynamic Spine) is the key to arrow accuracy, and no one does a better job at this than Carbon Express Express®. The Maxima RED® is a breakthrough in Dynamic Spine control. The new high-tech Carbon Express design features stiffer ends to contain the arrow's bending toward the RED ZONE®. The RED ZONE is the section of the arrow shaft engineered to absorb Dynamic Spine, enabling more consistent shooting with broader heads. Containing the arrow's bending toward the RED ZONE® delivers a new level of hunting performance, as arrow broadheads exaggerate the effect of arrow bending in flight and act like "wings" on the arrow's front end. By reducing arrow flex at the shaft's front end, the Maxima RED® ensures broadheads shoot tighter groups and achieve overall improved hunting performance. With the Maxima RED®—the best midweight hunting arrow of all time—the enemy of precision can be contained.

The Carbon Express Express® Maxima™ Triad™ is a Tri-Spine XSD (Extra Small Diameter) .166 hunting arrow with performance at its core. Equipped with the exclusive Carbon Express Express REDZONE™ Technology, the patented shaft with three spines generates less than 1/3 the vibration of single-spine arrows and FOUR TIMES THE ACCURACY for easier tuning and unmatched precision. The Triad is made from ultra-stiff and strong 30-T Carbon Express and recovers faster from the bow to reduce oscillation and enhance shot-to-shot repeatability. The smaller-diameter design means thicker walls, greater durability, reduced wind drift/crosswind impact, and exceptional penetration with true straightness of +/-.002". Each shaft pack is a laser-matched set, spine- and weight-sorted and tuned to deliver the best consistency in its class with a spine sorting tolerance of +/-.0025 and a weight sorting tolerance of +/-1.0 grains.

The ultimate lightweight hunting arrow has arrived. Equipped with Carbon Express Express' Spine Technology, where thin Kevlar strands are integrated into the fabric to achieve additional strength and flawless 360-degree spine. arrows.description: The Revelation 3:20 arrow, made from 100% Carbon Express, was developed for long-range target accuracy. After several years of product development and practical testing by our experts, we believe this is the best micro-diameter target shaft on the market. The high grains per inch and the surface-to-mass ratio of the Revelation help it glide effortlessly through the wind—minimizing the impact of unpredictable wind conditions. Combine this with the unmatched tolerances of the Revelation, and you have a winning combination where every arrow finds its place in the center of the target. If your goal is to stand at the top of the podium, then the Revelation is the arrow that will take you there!

The arrow is perfectly suited for traditional use, as it perfectly simulates the flight behavior of a wooden arrow. No surprise—it even has the same weight. It’s no coincidence that the world’s most famous archer has put his name on this Carbon Express arrow. "Unbelievably tough!" (Byron Ferguson)

The ORYX™ is our all-round talent. 100% Carbon Express prepregs are wound into an optimal shaft for target and 3D archery. The spine range of 350 to 1300 and precisely matched accessories allow for almost any configuration with every bow type. Olympic recurve archers will appreciate its forgiving and consistent accuracy, even at long distances. Weight-matched to established Carbon Express/aluminum WA shafts, this shaft remains robust and consistent, especially in the .003 and .001 straightness tolerances, contributing to tight groups. Spines 350 to 500 are particularly popular among compound archers. These spines are also equipped with a solid dose of kinetic energy and durability, ensuring precise flight, tight groups, and minimal arrow loss from robin-hooding, even in all weather conditions at 50m. The characteristics of the ORYX™ immediately caught the attention of traditional 3D archers, leading us to offer this shaft in a more cost-effective .006 straightness since June 2013. High accuracy in all weather conditions and extreme durability are qualities 3D archers repeatedly emphasize. A single ORYX™ shaft often gets to see trees from the inside. If you need a soft shaft for a long draw length, the ORYX™ is the alternative for you, as the shaft comes in all spines with a 33″ raw shaft length. Durability and extreme accuracy in all conditions will pleasantly surprise you.

A seamless extruded and drawn aluminum ENAW 7001 arrow shaft with tight tolerances and excellent flight characteristics. Bushings are pre-installed at the factory and accept, for example, the popular Aurel Standard nocks, F- or G-nocks. With minimal spine effect and its dolphin-gray anodized finish, AGNIS™ stands out not only for its elegant silver arrow appearance but also for its outstanding price-performance ratio. AGNIS™—fun, confidence, and success enhance your accuracy.

From the very first tests, we were certain—this shaft exhibits incredible performance values. Loaded to the wildest extremes, we named the beast—Norwegian—UHYRE™. UHYRE™ is a combination of 100% high-modulus Carbon Express prepregs and a newly formulated resin system. This allowed us to achieve remarkable weight savings while simultaneously increasing stability and durability. The wildest FOC desires are now possible with this shaft. Recurve and compound archers won’t believe their eyes. The shaft instantly converts the bow’s impulse power into forward momentum. It also wastes no energy during flight through unnecessary oscillation. It stabilizes in the shortest time, reaching the target with minimal loss of kinetic energy. Straight flight trajectories at speeds beyond 300 fps are possible with UHYRE™ without extensive bow tuning. High-modulus Carbon Express in spines 400 to 800 will challenge your shooting skills. Once tamed, UHYRE™ will help you push new performance limits.

The MANTIS™ is not cheaply pultruded but is instead multidirectionally wrapped from 100% high-performance composite prepregs. The arrow shaft is tuned to spine 750, making it suitable for more precise target shooting. The difference from pultruded arrow shafts is not just in the appearance, with internal components, but also in the significantly better results. A durable companion for recreational archers and for all bows up to 40 pounds draw weight. Also a great choice if you've just discovered archery for yourself and want long-term, repeatable success.

For archers who want to achieve even better results, this durable Carbon Express composite shaft was developed with 50% composite and 50% Carbon Express. The TRIOS X™ offers optimal properties in terms of durability and accuracy for archery. With a 500 spine, this arrow shaft is the ideal companion for the course. Get this robust and precise arrow shaft with higher kinetic energy. The flat and fast trajectory increases your enjoyment of success.

The AGIL™ follows the standard Carbon Express shaft diameter and was designed as an ultralight shaft. The performance parameters of the shafts allow razor-sharp trajectories over longer distances with excellent penetration power in the target. With the 0.246" inner diameter, most 5/16" or 9/32" components available on the market fit perfectly into the AGIL™. This allows you to rely on familiar or already existing components. After numerous durability tests, we succeeded in transferring the performance parameters to the spine 700 as well. Archers with low draw weights have experienced a very lightweight and extremely robust shaft since the introduction of the AGIL™ spine 700 in June 2012. Much flatter and faster trajectories than with spine 600 and heavy points at low draw weights—a concept that is already being copied by other competitors. The AGIL™ can be tuned equally well into an optimal arrow for Target, Field, or 3D shooting and will not only impress you.

A classic - Made-in-the-USA. Shoot your broadhead with the precision-crafted XX75 accuracy. TECHNICAL DATA - Pre-installed UNI bushings - RPS inserts included - 7075-T9 alloy - Pre-installed Super Nocks or X-Nock - Tensile strength (psi): 96,000 - Straightness guarantee: ± .002"

Traditionally since 1922. Doug Easton Archery started it all; in his small shop in California, he crafted longbows, leather quivers, and cedar shafts. The XX75 Legacy was designed with Easton Archery's early days in mind... Hats off to you, Doug. TECHNICAL DATA - 7075-T9 alloy - Conventional nocks - Integrated nock taper - Guaranteed straightness: ± .002". - RPS inserts included (fletched arrows include both nocks and inserts)

The Deep Six RPS steel inserts and the X HIT 8-32 break-off brass inserts are sold separately.

When it comes to the toughest animals in the world, I need the hardest-hitting arrow I can get. Dangerous Game gives me deep penetration for the heaviest, thickest-skinned animals on the planet. The combination of high strength and a high-load Carbon Express core, wrapped in a fully reinforced metal jacket, provides the Dangerous Game with the full bone-breaking power I need for hunting worldwide." - Phil Phillips TECHNICAL DATA - High-strength N-FUSED® Carbon Express core with 7075 metal alloy jacket - Guaranteed straightness: ± .002″ - Light target pull INCLUDED COMPONENTS: - Pre-installed orange X nocks - Conventional break-off brass X HIT inserts SEPARATELY SOLD COMPONENTS: - Conventional X HIT inserts - Deep Six6 RPS steel inserts - Deep Six6 broadheads - Field arrows

TECHNICAL DATA - Pre-installed H-nocks - Lightweight high-speed Carbon Express - Straightness: ± .001" - 8-32 brass inserts included

The high-speed Superdrive 19, made from Easton Archery's Superdrive Carbon Express construction, offers archers a lightweight arrow choice with a smaller diameter, making it ideal for 3D competitions where wind could be a factor, as well as for field and outdoor target archery, making it a great all-purpose competition arrow for outdoor use. The Superdrive 19 features an adjustable stainless steel point system, allowing the archer to customize the weight from 90 to 200 grains with interchangeable weight modules. The Superdrive 19 is available in three spine variations and is suitable for most compound and recurve bow setups. The Superdrive 19 connects the Superdrive 23, 25, and 27 shafts, completing the full range of Easton Archery Carbon Express shafts.

Hunting accuracy for the archer was the focus in the development of the Easton Archery 6.5 arrows. The 6.5 utilizes the proprietary Acu-Carbon Express™ Uniform Spine process. Acu-Carbon Express™ is a continuous feed manufacturing process that achieves the most reliable tolerances, eliminating the need for spine alignment and weight sorting. Easton Archery's Acu-Carbon Express™ production line produces the most consistent spines and weights year after year, dozen after dozen. This benefits the bowhunter with more precise flight and higher target accuracy in the field. Easton Archery, the leading name in archery since 1922, has announced the new 6.5 hunting arrow series, now available. The Easton Archery 6.5MM™ arrows are USA-made shafts, offering bowhunters the highest level of precision available today—at prices that fit virtually any budget. The Easton Archery 6.5 features NEW 6.5MM inserts, manufactured with a 4X larger shoulder to increase strength and enhance valuable FOC. The 6.5 will also include Microlite nocks, designed to bring the nock throat closer to the back of the arrow shaft. This simplifies the release and further optimizes shot precision. Microlite nocks are 38% lighter to increase arrow speed and shift weight forward, improving arrow flight. The Easton Archery Carbon Express 6.5™ product line includes three base models: - Match Grade ±.001" - Hunter Classic ±.003" - Bowhunter ±.006" TECHNICAL INFORMATION - Acu-Carbon Express™ Uniform Spine USA – Manufacturing process for maximum precision. - Microlite Nocks – Shortens the critical distance between shaft and bowstring for better alignment and reduced weight. - 6.5MM Inserts – The precision-machined component features a four-times larger shoulder. Reinforces the broadhead/arrow interface and increases F.O.C. - Bully™ Vane Fletching – Stiffer material for superior control and quiet arrow flight. - Available in three models: Match Grade ±.001", Hunter Classic ±.003", and Bowhunter ±.006". - Spine sizes: 340, 400, 500

Hunting accuracy for the archer was the focus in the development of the Easton Archery 6.5 arrows. The 6.5 uses the proprietary Acu-Carbon Express™ Uniform Spine process. Acu-Carbon Express™ is a continuous-feed manufacturing process that delivers the most reliable tolerances, eliminating the need for spine alignment and weight sorting. Easton Archery's Acu-Carbon Express™ production line produces the most consistent spines and weights year after year, dozen after dozen. This benefits the bowhunter with more precise flight and higher target accuracy in the field. NEW Easton Archery RX7 - The Ultimate Indoor Recurve Arrow Shaft Easton Archery's exclusive Tapered Technology enables a larger line-catcher arrow with reduced bow and/or point weight. New for the 2020 indoor season, Easton Archery announces the most precise, technically advanced indoor arrow shaft ever developed for recurve archers—the brand-new RX-7 series. Available in three spine values—525, 475, and 420—in diameters 21, 22, and World Archery Maximum 23. Easton Archery's new RX-7 series 7178 aluminum arrow shafts feature a precision rear taper—allowing recurve archers to shoot a larger arrow with reduced bow weight and less point weight while maintaining maximum shaft diameter for higher scoring potential. The RX-7 proved itself during the 2018-19 competition season with some of the world's top archers, including Brady Ellison and Jack Williams of Team USA. It is based on the same proven design principle as Easton Archery's X10 and A/C/E shafts, with a precise, flexible, forgiving rear taper. Williams said: "The RX-7's rear taper creates the most forgiving aluminum arrow for a recurve archer. It allows archers to use lighter point weights to achieve proper tuning, enabling faster releases and better arrow flight." This design element reduces the dynamic spine of the arrow shaft by up to a full size, allowing the use of a larger diameter and lighter point. Previously, many archers seeking maximum-diameter shafts often compromised bow tuning and potentially sacrificed shot-forgiveness by using super-heavy points, leading to greater error potential with slight release variations. By using a standard weight point and a precision-engineered, more flexible rear taper with a forward-weighted design, the RX-7 series shafts offer the ultimate shot-forgiveness. The RX-7 uses a solid 7178-T9 alloy that handles tough European target materials with ease. RX-7 shafts come with Easton Archery Super-UNI bushings, accommodating available Easton Archery Super Nocks, 3D Super Nocks, and the popular Beiter nock in size 19. The updated tuning chart for the RX-7 is available online at www.Easton Archeryarchery.com. RX-7 shafts are 100% made in the USA. A technical article detailing tuning techniques for the RX7 can be read at the link below. https://Easton Archeryarchery.com/2019/10/technical-guide-to-setting-up-the-Easton Archery-rx-7-arrow-shaft/

ABOUT THE PRODUCT Highest quality and top performance usually come with a corresponding price. Well, not anymore. The new A/C PROCOMP arrow from Easton Archery is now available for Target and Field competitions. The lightweight, parallel PROCOMP with high speed and low weight is designed for archers looking to improve their scores in club-level competitions and Compound tournaments. The PROCOMP was proven in the 2018 season by world champions Steve Anderson and Braden Gellenthien on high-level tournament courses, earning five podium finishes in archery and another at the first event of the 2019 World Championship season. The 4MM PROCOMP features Easton Archery's unmatched spine consistency and precise weight accuracy, utilizing our exclusive high-modulus Carbon Express and super-strong alloy core construction. Compatible with most 4mm Easton Archery components, including direct-mount G-nocks and DEEP-SIX nocks (recommended for high-energy compound nock systems). See the table below for details on compatible point and bolt nock systems. Available spine values: 300, 340, 380, 420, 470, 520, and 570. All PROCOMP shafts are delivered in a sealed 12-pack with a +/-1-grain weight tolerance per dozen. Straightness .0015" or better. MADE IN THE USA. Available in spine values: 300, 340, 380, 420, 470, 520, and 570.

New 5MM Axis SPT Carbon Express arrows with high penetration for bows with shorter draw/lower weight. Easton Archery's Axis SPT is the newest member of the legendary AXIS series, offering improved field performance for bowhunters with shorter draws and/or lighter arrow setups. The SPT is available in three spine values (500, 600, and 700) and provides exceptional value for money. The Axis SPT hunting arrows with a micro-diameter of 5 mm are compatible with all Axis accessory components, including the highly sought-after FOC-enhancing Easton Archery brass inserts, and now they're more affordable than ever. TECHNICAL DATA - Pre-installed X-Nock - X HIT 8-32 Inserts - Straightness: ± .006" - High-strength Carbon Express composite fibers

The legendary X23/X27 have been refreshed for 2020! In response to requests from top archers worldwide, we have updated the all-silver look of the X23/27 series shafts with a hard-coated, Black Eagle, diamond-polished finish. The classic diamond-polished silver finish on the X23 nock end remains unmistakable on the line and in your quiver, while the deep Black Eagle polished finish on the front half ensures easier visibility for line-catchers. The world-record-worthy, U.S.-made X27 and X23 are undoubtedly the most precise arrows ever built—meeting the highest standards for world-class tournament archers. With the most demanding spine, highest weight, and straightest tolerances of any arrow, the X-series delivers the precision competitors need to gain those extra few points required to win at the highest levels of tournament competition. The X27 is the perfect teammate where regulations allow a maximum-diameter 27-class shaft, such as at The Vegas Shoot. Easton Archery's new Avance and Avance Sport 4MM arrows are full-Carbon Express target arrows. Avance and Avance Sport share the same Carbon Express construction and are then sorted by straightness. The Avance has a straightness of +/- 0.003", ideal for mid-level archers; and the Avance Sport features a straightness specification of +/- 0.006", ideal for inexperienced archers seeking light performance in a less expensive arrow. The Avance series is available in a wide range of spine sizes, covering the tuning range for recurve and compound archers across a broad spectrum of bow types, draw lengths, and poundages. The durable full-Carbon Express construction of the Avance nets a lighter arrow than previous Easton Archery offerings, enabling top-tier performance and providing significant advantages for beginner to mid-level target archers. Features: - 4MM full-Carbon Express target arrows - Avance +/- .003" straightness; Avance Sport +/-.006" straightness - Lighter weight than arrows from earlier categories (Carbon Express One and Apollo) - Available in 16 spines from 340-2000

NEW Easton Archery RX7 - The Ultimate Indoor Recurve Arrow Shaft Easton Archery's exclusive Tapered Technology enables a larger line-catcher arrow with lower bow and/or point weight. New for the 2020 indoor season, Easton Archery announces the most precise, technically advanced indoor arrow shaft ever developed for recurve archers—the brand-new RX-7 series. Available in three spine values—525, 475, and 420—in diameters 21, 22, and World Archery Maximum 23. Easton Archery's new RX-7 series 7178 aluminum arrow shafts feature a precision rear taper—allowing recurve archers to shoot a larger arrow with lower bow weight and less point weight while maintaining maximum shaft diameter for higher scoring potential. The RX-7 proved itself during the 2018-19 competition season with some of the world's best archers, including Brady Ellison and Jack Williams from Team USA. It is based on the same proven design principle as Easton Archery's X10 and A/C/E shafts, with a precise, flexible, forgiving rear taper. Williams said: "The RX-7's rear taper creates the most forgiving aluminum arrow for a recurve archer. It allows archers to use a lighter point weight to achieve proper tuning, enabling faster release and better arrow flight." This design element reduces the dynamic spine of the arrow shaft by up to a full size, allowing the use of a larger diameter and lighter point. Previously, many archers seeking maximum-diameter shafts often had to compromise bow tuning and potentially risk the forgiveness of shooting technique by using super-heavy points, leading to greater error potential with slight release variations. By using a standard weight point and a precision-engineered, more flexible rear taper with a forward-weighted design, the RX-7 series shafts offer the ultimate forgiveness at release. The RX-7 uses a solid 7178-T9 alloy that easily handles tough European target materials. RX-7 shafts come with Easton Archery Super-UNI bushings, accommodating available Easton Archery Super Nocks, 3D Super Nocks, and the popular Beiter nock in size 19. The updated tuning chart for the RX-7 is available online at www.Easton Archeryarchery.com. RX-7 shafts are 100% made in the USA. A technical article detailing tuning techniques for the RX7 can be read at the link below. https://Easton Archeryarchery.com/2019/10/technical-guide-to-setting-up-the-Easton Archery-rx-7-arrow-shaft/

The high-performance Easton Archery A/C PROCOMP, renowned for podium finishes in professional tournaments worldwide, has now been optimized for field and hunting use in the new PROCOMP Hunting Series. The PROCOMP delivers a higher level of precision and better tuning in a high-performance target shaft. Based on Easton Archery's patented 4MM Parallel Shaft profile with micro-diameter, the PROCOMP is an ideal solution for competitive target and field archers demanding high performance standards at an affordable price. The new Pro Comp Hunting Series will be available in sizes 380, 340, 300, and NEW 250, and comes with 8-32 aluminum half-outserts and 4mm deep six-nock collars. An optional titanium 8-32 half-out is also available separately. The Pro Comp arrows are ultra-lightweight, built on the proven 7075 aluminum core and fused with a high-strength, high-modulus Carbon Express shell. With its precise straightness tolerance of ±.0015" and minimal weight variation of +/- 0.5 grains, the Pro Comp delivers the trusted, predictable performance demanded by the world's top archers—now available to all field archers and bowhunters. The USA-made Pro Comp shafts feature a matte Black Eagle, low-glare Carbon Express surface for easy fletching.

Easton Archery unveiled a new lightweight arrow in its 6.5 mm product line—the 6.5 MATRIX. This new arrow is an ultralight model that uses Easton Archery's seamless Acu-Carbon Express™ process. Additionally, the Matrix features a new Carbon Express fiber weave visible on the exterior of the shaft. Easton Archery's patented process results in a seamless shaft that delivers nearly perfect spine and weight with every production run. Without the inconsistency in weight and spine found in traditional arrow manufacturing methods, arrows made from Acu-Carbon Express are easier to tune and offer better accuracy on the range and in the field.

Technical Data: - Micro-diameter, 100% Carbon Express hunting arrow - increased speed - Reduced friction in flight and upon impact for optimized FOC, improved target penetration, and better long-range accuracy - 4 popular hunting spine sizes - 250, 300, 340, and 400 - Includes NEW aluminum points; 4MM nocks pre-installed - Shipped in dozens of bare shafts - Made in the USA - Straightness: +/- .003″ [Match Grade: +/- .001″]

The 4MM FMJ delivers the highest penetration power and is precision-manufactured in the USA for the most accurate hunting arrow on the market. The 4MM Full Metal Jacket has been updated with a new spine configuration, a completely redesigned 8-32 point outsert system, and new graphics. The standard 8-32 threaded point outsert optimizes the front-of-center for easier arrow tuning and increased durability. FMJ starts with an advanced Carbon Express core for lightweight strength. A full metal jacket adds kinetic energy, improves accuracy, and makes extraction from the target easier. The combination ensures deep penetration and more pass-throughs for quicker kills and stronger blood trails.
